svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_11_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/51.0.2704.103 Safari/537.36" version="5.5.3.2" editor="www.draw.io" type="google"><diagram></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 63px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
